Beware the IDEs (of March)

IDE = Integrated Development Environment

For those of us that didn't study computer science...

IDE = â€œsoftware for writing softwareâ€

Iâ€™ll recommend a few different solutions, depending on the age of the studentâ€™s youâ€™re working with, your own tech comfort, and the ease with which you can install software on your classroom(s) computers:

Tool Good forâ€¦ When to leave itâ€¦
Trinket Beginners. Login with Google. No installs needed. Helpful hints. To learn how code is actually written.
IDLE What you get for installing Python. Nothing to configure. If you can install PyCharmâ€¦
PyCharm (EDU Edition) Projecting on a screen. Professional Python development. If you preferâ€¦
Some Text Editor (Atom, Sublime Text) Everything Never. This is your tool chest, your Swiss Army Knife, your duct tape.
